bulkCodesDescription1: Using PlanetCash you can generate thousands of codes in a single operation.
bulkCodesDescription2: You can use this feature to create codes for custom certificates, gift cards, donations on behalf of users and redeemable codes that you can associate with your products.

importMethodText.title: Import File
importMethodText.subtitle: Use this method if one of the following criterias match your usecase:
details: I want to provide the Recipient's name or Email for each code
I want Plant-for-the-Planet to automatically email the recipients once it has been generated (optional)
I want to issue codes with different units of trees

genericMethodText.title: Create Generic Codes
genericMethodText.subtitle: Use this method if the following criterias match your usecase:
details: All codes will have the same value
I want to generate a number of code for arbitrary recipients
Names and Emails cannot be associated with the code

chargeConsentText: By clicking Issue Codes, you agree that above amount will be charged to your account.
unitsRequired: Unit per code is a required
featureAvailability: This feature is available only for partner project.
planetCashDisabled: PlanetCash is disabled. Please enable PlanetCash to use this feature.
addBalanceGeneric: Please Click here to add funds.

instructionsUploadCSV.empty: Drag and drop / click to select a .csv or .xslx file for upload
instructionsUploadCSV.error: Please check for issues and drag .csv or .xlsx file here to upload
instructionsUploadCSV.processing: Please wait while we analyze your file...
instructionsUploadCSV.success: Continue or drag .csv or .xlsx file here to replace current file.
